name: Caffeinate Skate (Trijam 120)
description:
Grab the coffees and avoid the enemies

W jumps and S crouches. You can double jump. You move automatically.

Press Enter to restart after a game over.

This project uses Unreal Engine's 2D sidescrolling template. Unreal Engine can be found here.

This game took around 6 hours to create. A more detailed devlog can be found here.
